summary: Image generation application with backend placeholder
architectural_notes: Backend uses JavaScript for image generation (non-standard for ICP)
Image generation returns placeholder URL format

existing_features.title: Create a frontend interface that allows users to input a text prompt, call the backend generateImage function, and display the returned image URL

Apply a creative and cohesive visual design theme to the application with a distinct style using harmonious colors (avoid blue and purple), readable typography, and clean layout patterns that enhance the image generation experience

new_feature_requests.summary: Backend image generation endpoint returning placeholder

Create a backend function in main.mo that accepts a text prompt and returns a structured response containing an imageUrl field with the placeholder URL 'https://placehold.co/1024x1536?text=Backend+OK'
Add a constant named 'token' with the value 'HIER_DEIN_TOKEN' to the backend main.mo file for storing the Replicate API authentication token
